They came to me some time ago with plans to expand Dubai airport. I told them I do not want an airport for Dubai, but I want Dubai to be an airport for the world. The message arrived and the thinking changed.
Today Dubai is building the world's largest airport. And expand its largest international airport .. And buy the largest order of aircraft at the date of aviation worth $ 100 billion # of my mind

I have a lot of ideas and I rely on most of the ideas that come from the officials. I can say that ideas are two kinds of living ideas and another are born dead of my mind

The living idea has a spirit, energy and noise .. The movement is forcing you to pay attention to it .. Because the owner tells her of his energy and movement and his mind, spirit and life .. # My_moverty

We give life to our ideas and projects and our vision if we believe in it and strive to achieve it, and as much as we give it to be her life, and as far as we tell her is getting stronger # of my mind

There are ideas only one day and another dead breed, and some of them live for a month or a year .. And we have long-standing ideas and their owners lived their lives completed a thousand years of my mind

Sa inyong lahat: maraming, maraming salamat. Napakalaking karangalan ang pamunuan kayo.
Hindi ako natinag dahil nasa likod ko kayo. Tunay ngang hindi ako nag-iisa.
Kung tayo’y babalik sa baluktot, habambuhay tayong mag-aabang sa wala.
Ang susunod na halalan ay referendum para sa Daang Matuwid.
Maski sa pagbaba ko sa puwesto, hanggang sa aking huling hininga, makakaasa kayo, hindi rin kayo mag-iisa.
Kung magtutuloy ang Daang Matuwid, sa loob ng isang henerasyon, first world na raw po tayo.
Simula pa lang ito. Nasa unang yugto pa lang tayo ng dakilang kuwento ng sambayanang Pilipino.
